/*
 * This is sample code generated by rpcgen.
 * These are only templates and you can use them
 * as a guideline for developing your own functions.
 */

#include "rev.h"

strings *stringrev_1_svc(strings *argp, struct svc_req *rqstp)
{
	static strings  result;
//static strings  result;
	int l= strlen(argp->str);
	int i;
	int n;
	n=l;
	//printf("\n received:%s\n",n);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
	result.str[i]=argp->str[l-1];
	l--;
	}


	/*
	 * insert server code here
	 */

	return &result;
}
